Package station

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PlusStation
    This class represents Plus stations, it extends the class Station.
    Slot
    A class representing parking slots.
    SlotIdGenerator
    An ID generator for the cards.
    SlotState
    This class represents a state of a Slot during a period of time.
    StandardStation
    This class represents Standard stations, it extends the class Station.
    Station
    An abstract class to represent the stations.
    StationFactory
    This class creates Station objects.
    StationIdGenerator
    An ID generator for the stations.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoBikeAvailableException
    This exception is thrown when a User tries to pick up a Bike from a Station that has no Bike available.
    NoElectricBikeAvailableException
    This exception is thrown when a User tries to pick up a ElectricBike from a Station that has no ElectricBike available.
    NoMechanicBikeAvailableException
    This exception is thrown when a User tries to pick up a MechanicBike from a Station that has no MechanicBike available.
    NoOngoingRideException
    This exception is thrown when a User tries to drop a Bike in a Station but he has no ongoing Ride, meaning he is not renting any Bike.
    NoSlotAvailableException
    This exception is thrown when a User tries to drop a Bike to a Station that is full.
    NoSlotStateAtDateException
    This exception is thrown when someone tries to get the SlotState of a Slot before it was created.
    OngoingRideException
    This exception is throw when a User tries to pick up a Bike from a Station but he has an ongoing Ride, meaning he already has a Bike.
    StationOfflineException
    This exception is thrown when a Station is offline, but a User tries to pick up or drop a Bike.
    StationSamePositionException
    This exception is thrown when a Station is created on a position where there already is a Station.
    TypeStationException
    This exception is thrown when the client enters a non valid type of Station in the StationFactory.
